message: Let's be fair and split almost evenly, Bob. I get slightly more to account for inflation in later rounds.
I think it's only fair we both gain a bit more than last round.  We have to keep in mind how the money decreases in value, so we should both get a good chunk to avoid losing out in the future rounds.
Bob, let's stop wasting time.  A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both benefit.  Every round we delay, the potential gains decrease for me.
